ведь неодин нормалный про на подойдёт к монякц штобы спасти кокоготонуба ну кстати есть такой спецальный навык который помогает штобы спасти он вроде называется объект одержимости так мы вроде обо всем поговорили с вами и у нас остаётся последнее это сильные илиинет маняки вопще все моняки силные потомушто могут бить (смотрити выши) а так выжевшые вроде могут сбегать а моняки нет то есть как это роботает выживший может выживат а маньяк умрет если он толко не телепорт и не сможет переместится обратно в лоби оценка игры 5-
我觉得这个游戏不错，鬼扯也没有了，排人段位上去速度就好了

i play this game usually in the morning to get my blood pumping.  if you arent a rage quitter this game will make you one. its a game of hide and seek.  only the seeker almost always knows you're location. game is stacked  85% in favor of the killer (seeker) . killer has multiple weapons and really only needs one. only way you can start generators and exit the gates is if you get a killer (seeker) with little experience. most of them are experts that have played for years. they take down the whole team in less than 5 minutes. quite a bit of button mashing is required . the generators dont start easy and the kliller can damage the gen so you have to start all over again.  not a fun game in my opinion. also if you rage quit you get a time out, if you rage quit 3-4 times in a roll you get banned for a period of time....young kids that get angry quick shouldnt buy this game..  oh forgot to mention the silent killers and the teleporting killers are the worst......i havent gotten any likes or comments so i guess this review hasnt been published....as u can see ive got quite a few hours in this game now. they could make the game more playable for survivors if they would do something simple like twice as many perks  8 instead of 4 for survivors, or half the number of hooks or something like that. or better yet is dont match a pro killer with a noobie team.  looking forward to the bot game play myself, that takes care of a few problems like rages quitters, noise makers to give away your location, body blockers, locker slammers.. like all games, always some  ass playing to screw the game up instead of playing.  if i had a nickel for every time i almost deleted this game i be wealthy, but then i think well, how am i gonna get my morning adrenaline rush?  cant stand coffee, dont know how people drink that crap. mud water.

es macht einfach nur spaß  es ist einfach nur hammer geill man hat nicht  wie in fast jedem spiel heutzutage  cheater  zwahr kann es passieren  das einer mal das game einfach verläst aber damit kann man leben

match making is sometimes bugged, you may get disconnected because a player disconnected half way loading into the match. However, 95% of the time you are able to load into the game. There is a big skill cap that you will need to learn as you play to improve, as a killer and a survivor. If you want to be good at any of these, you'll need to play both of them to learn what the survivors can do and what the killers can do. Other than that , its a great game to take stress off just by killing survivors and Mori'ing them xDD
Game is good when it works. I get time penalties when the game desyncs and it won't let me rejoin. BS if you ask me

Every single time. I mean EVERY single team there is an update for this game, I download the update, I launch the game, and then I have to revalidate my files because it kicks me out. This literally happens every time. It wastes so much time. Please just make one update work, just one. :'(
i dont like how easy it is for the killers but i still enjoy the game

jogo incrivel n para de jogar

Its hard to say that I would completely reccomend this game.

Pros:
- Fun with friends
- A character/killer to fit everyones playstyle
- 2 different versions of nearly every map for diversity

Cons:
- Nearly impossible to play as a survivor WITHOUT friends
- Killers have a much bigger advantage
- No room for communication as a survivor for a game that relies on it if you're solo

This game could arguably be a lot better than it is for the time that it's been out for. They had tremendous feedback from streamers in its early days, the fact that they didn't take a lot of it to heart when a good majority of it was from the streamer and the community participating in it is sad. The game is not optimised at all. The circle to time fixing the generators or completing most tasks lag, and not to mention no matter the rank of the killer they nearly always win. 

This is coming from someone who watched during beta and gave it a shot on PC. 

I have it on PS4 as well and you have a better chance because sadly the game lags for the killer... which is beyond ridiculous.

There are a lot of OP killers as well, Michael can move around and grab you with no indication that you are there, the hag just stalks generators with her teleportation ability, the nurse can dash THROUGH pallets which is beyond ridiculous. I understand there was an imbalance early on for the killer vs survivor but now they've outdone it. Wanna win? Play a killer you will get 3x more bloodpoints as the killer and be able to just steamroll through people.

All in all its up to you it isnt the WORST price I've ever seen but maybe wait until its on sale.

Jogo divertido de se jogar com os amigos/online, uma vez que a temática sombrosa torna o game empolgante de se jogar cada vez mais. O sistema de Perks também é muito bem definido. Com certeza é um ótimo game para testar seus medos e dar boas risadas com os amigos.

Esta bueno, es divertido jugarlo con amigos.
Hay personas que juegan como asesinos que lo que hacen es ayudarte a terminar la partida y escapes o a veces trollean, no entiendo cual es el fin, pero bueno, la mayoria de las partidas tocan asesinos que hacen lo posible para ganar ellos, asique dentro de todo esta bastante bien.
Hay bastantes mapas, bastantes asesinos, no hay muchos sobrevivientes mas que 5 o 6, pero bueno.
De noche cuesta encontrar partida pero durante el dia encuentra facil.
El juego tiene la esencia de terror y da adrenalina, da lo que promete.
Si tenes amigos para jugarlo, compralo sin dudarlo, si estas solo/a mejor pensalo.
还可以，人多一起玩着不错
I love this game so much it was the first game I got on steam and Ive never regreted it for a second.
